about:
The definition of my current job is « technology agnostic » developer. I do what's best for the project I'm working on.
I mainly work on web-based stuffs (site, apps and web-apps), but I love to experiment new HCI and more tangible stuffs.

Feel free to have a look at my latest projects either experiments, freelance or built at Pirata.

I will be available for freelance at the beginning of March 2012.
